name: MYC_CONVO_ABT_ACCOUNTS
description: Guarantor accounts associated with MyChart message conversation.

columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This is the guarantor account that this conversation is about.

columns.name: GUAR_BILL_SYS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This the account type (PB, HB, SBO) for the guarantor account for this conversation.
